Class Session

java.lang.Object
  Session

public class Session
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a network session. Keeps track of members active, who's in charge, and manages data.

               DrawingCanvas canvas,

               ChatPanelView chatPanel,
               ControlPanelView controlPanel)
        throws java.rmi.activation.ActivationException
Create a new Session on the local machine, that this application will not be in charge of. If the master specified can't be found, throws ActivationException.
